mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, STREET_CITY_ID, REG_ID, REG_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_STREET_REG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_STREET_REG (COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, STREET_CITY_ID, REG_ID, REG_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME) values (#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update FUN_STREET_REG
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_STREET_REG set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_CITY_ID = #{streetCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID, A.STREET_CITY_ID, A.REG_ID, A.REG_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.CITY_NAME, C.PROVINCE_NAME, D.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_REG A LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_CITY B ON A.STREET_CITY_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_PROVINCE C ON A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY D ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = D.ID WHERE A.STREET_CITY_ID = #{streetCityId} AND A.IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_STREET_REG SET IS_DEL = 1, DEL_TIME = GETDATE(), DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID, A.STREET_CITY_ID, A.REG_ID, A.REG_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.CITY_NAME, C.PROVINCE_NAME, D.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_REG A LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_CITY B ON A.STREET_CITY_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_PROVINCE C ON A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY D ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = D.ID WHERE A.ID = #{streetRegId}
